title: I am genuinely impressed!
body:
The PROJECT: Skins, we all know that project yasuo was a popular hit, and everyone is always going to buy the cyber themed skins mecha/battlecast/project skins etc etc so its pretty standard to bring out more of the popular cyber type skins, especially for champs that are played a lot like Zed, yasuo, Yi, Leona etc. but the effort RIOT has put in to the project ones is something I'm impressed with, even to go so far as to sync all their recalls.

usually in a themed skin pack there is one or two that always let it down, like battlecast cho, skarner and kog are really well done but battlecast xerath (while still a good skin) lets the bundle down a bit. The pentakill bundle is awesome but yorick and sona leave a bit to be desired.
even the team skins, SKT T1 Zyra doesnt live up to the rest of them, nor does SSW rengar. Vandal Jax etc.
but with the project skins they are all really well designed, there is a good meta team that can be used (a bit on the AD side but no matter) and they are all consistent with particle effects, unlike the mecha and battlecast theme.
so I'm very very impressed.

the only downside is that there will be mirror lanes to hell unless you play mid, but going Yas against zed is never fun :/
but ill deal haha

replies.body: Only Project skin they screwed up was Lucian. The rest are really awesome skins. Not sure what Riot has against Project Yasuo though, giving the other 5 skins more special treatment. Also, for once Riot wants people to buy these skins at 1350RP (so they put in the special load screen) and then punish other people for buying them at 975RP a week later.
yas will always beat zed if he haz actual skill ;) or that zed is just completely retard
